The unread emails were retrieved, and among them, there's an email from Alice referencing a new colleague. However, there are no attachments listed in this specific email. The most relevant email is the one with the subject "New Colleague Joining Our Team." Unfortunately, it does not contain a CV attachment. 

I will now proceed to download the attachment from the second unread email titled "Meeting Summary and Follow-up," as it has an attachment (with ID '4'). I will check if this attachment can help me with the required information or perhaps has the colleague's details attached.
